name: converse
description: Converse.js is an open-source XMPP chat client that runs in the browser. It can connect to any XMPP server and supports multi-user chat, encryption, OMEMO, plugins, and mobile-friendly UI. It is fully open and self-hostable.
features: XMPP Protocol: Connect to any XMPP server for federated chat. Open standards, no lock-in.
Browser-Based: No installation needed, runs entirely in the browser. Instant messaging anywhere.
Multi-User Chat: Join group conversations and chat rooms. Collaborate with teams.
OMEMO Encryption: End-to-end encrypted messaging for privacy. Secure conversations guaranteed.
Plugin System: Extend functionality with custom plugins. Tailor to your needs.
Mobile Friendly: Responsive design works on phones and tablets. Chat on any device.
